I had a very frustrating experience with the Murci website. After placing an order, I realized that the wrong item was placed, but unfortunately, there’s no cancellation or order modification option available, unlike most other online sites. I ordered items ready for going away during the summer, I had decided which items I wanted to keep and which to send back and packaged up ready. Upon trying to make my return within their return window, there was an issue on the portal and I could not access a QR code to return my parcel the following day as planned. I sent an email to customer services within the return window requesting support with this however it took over 3 days for a response, at this point It was just outside of the return window. The response agreed to support with my return, as it was an issue on their end. however at this point I had already departed to go abroad for 2 weeks. On my return I reached out to explain that I had not received the response from them in time and had been away. And requested support to continue with the return as they had already agreed to do so outside of the return window.
Unfortunately I was met with nothing but rude customer service, the same individual from the customer service team who answered me continuously with the same response, and who went back on this agreement made by another member of the team. Refusal to accept my return or support with the return and declined a refund several times. I explained my circumstance politely each time, that it was not my fault, that I had been within the return period when reaching out to them, that the issue was on their part and that I had been already given confirmation of support outside of the return window. I even explained my financial situation as it was a large order with multiple different sizes of the same item in the order which i purchased via credit, and I explained that I would be unable to pay for this.
As it is consumer rights I asked for the issue to be escalated I was ignored by this same member of staff and received a message saying that they would no longer respond to me. Which they didn't!
Despite having all evidence and dates and written agreement of support to return outside of the return window due to an issue on Murci’s returns Portal and no fault of my own, and i contacted them again with this info via Resolver (an online complains company to try to resolve issues and keep information) The company still failed to answer or support me.
And still took my money. Putting me in a really difficult situation and caused alot of stress.
I Have been in touch with the financial ombudsman and fully intend to return the items and get a full refund as evidently the company do not care.
Do not shop here, their clothing may be nice but there are cheaper sites with clothing that look practically identical and just as nice, with much more supportive customer service. Their customer care support and service is appalling. I will never shop here again.

Lovely dresses, but be careful with the 14 days return policy.

Even though I created the returns label within the 14 days period, the goods also need to be shipped back within the 14 days which I don’t think is completley clear on the website. 14 days is the absolute minimum a company can give you for a return where all other companies are 28 days.

There are plenty of companies that will also allow you to create the return label within the timeframe and still allows you to return the goods slightly after the 14 days. My return of the two dressses was declined as it was only slightly out of the returns period, a grace period for customers should be given especially when they expect you to wait longer than 14 days to communicate with you regarding the return, even though there policy states 14 days to arrange the refund which they didn’t comply with.

Title: Absolutely Stunning Dress!

I recently purchased the Maxi Dress and I couldn't be more thrilled with my choice! This dress is an absolute showstopper and has quickly become my go-to for both casual outings and special occasions.

The fabric is beautifully soft and lightweight, making it perfect for warm weather while still providing excellent coverage. I was impressed by the quality; it feels durable yet delicate at the same time. The vibrant floral print is eye-catching without being overpowering, and the colors are true to what was pictured online.

I love the fit! The dress has a flattering silhouette that accentuates my waist while allowing for easy movement. It falls to the perfect length, and the flowy skirt adds a touch of elegance. I also appreciate the adjustable straps, which help in getting the perfect fit for my body shape.

I've received so many compliments every time I've worn it, and I feel confident and beautiful. Whether dressing it up with heels or keeping it casual with sandals, it always looks fabulous.

Overall, I highly recommend this dress to anyone looking for a versatile and stylish addition to their wardrobe. It’s definitely a worthwhile investment!
